dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I'll try to blend in with the group and avoid raising suspicion. Let's focus on discussing potential threats to our safety or any suspicious activities we've noticed.

dialogue.speaker: Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Bob

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I maintain my innocence and urge everyone to reconsider the evidence. I have been working to keep our group safe and have not displayed any behavior or made any statements that would suggest I am the assassin. Let's continue investigating together
